column4: BRIEF-Proact buys business unit from VX Company
column5: * Proact acquires the business unit "Microsoft datacenter innovation services" from VX Company

column4: WRAPUP 4-U.S. economy contracts in Q1; dollar hurts corporate profits
column5: WASHINGTON  May 29 The U.S. economy contracted in the first quarter as it buckled under the weight of unusually heavy snowfalls  a resurgent dollar and disruptions at West Coast ports  but activity already has rebounded modestly.

column5: May 29 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Friday:

column4: Intel close to deal to buy Altera for $16 billion: sources
column5: Intel Corp  has resumed negotiations to buy smaller chip maker Altera Corp  and is close to a $16 billion acquisition agreement  people familiar with the matter said on Friday. | Video

column4: Intel nears $15 bln deal to buy Altera - NY Post
column5: May 29 Intel Corp is close to a deal to buy smaller chip maker Altera Corp for about $15 billion  the New York Post reported.
